to build an academic path of excellence and properly valued by the labour market

We are a
University of
Excellence!

With over 100 years of history, the University of Porto is a leading
teaching and scientific research institution in Portugal and worldwide.

Considered the best Portuguese University and one of the best 100
European institutions according to the most important Higher
Education rankings, U.Porto combines quality teaching and excellent
research with the best academic experience.

We are waiting for you!

See More

Research

Research University

With 48 research units and a highly qualified scientific community, the University of Porto is one of the largest producers of science in Portugal, contributing to almost 25% of all national scientific output.

The excellence of our scientific ecosystem is particularly evident in the leading position the University occupies in the main international rankings of Higher Education.

Learn more
